channel.title: anomaly on Data Trigger
channel.description: Recent content in anomaly on Data Trigger

item.title: Outlier detection
item.author: contact@datatrigger.org (Vincent Le Goualher)
item.description: In this post, I try to define what an outlier is and I present several ways to approach the problem of anomaly detection. Then, I present the Local Outlier Factor algorithm and apply it on a specific dataset to show its power, using both Python and R. I also compare its performance with the Isolation Forest method.
